distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for postgresql fixes the following issues:

- Changed permissions, so that the directory can only be used by users 
  in the postgres group (bsc#1123886).
- Moved bash profile out of /var/lib to allow transactional updates (bsc#1100397).
notes.title: Description of the patch
